c:complexType.name: BulletChartOptions
c:complexType.c:documentation: The options documentation class of the Bullet chart.

c:property.name: bullet
c:property.c:documentation: The bullet plot is the main plot of the bullet chart, which means that its properties may be used without the "bullet" property suffix.

c:complexType.name: BulletPlotOptions
c:complexType.c:documentation: The options documentation class of the Bullet plot.
